price: 55. (José) dijo: “Pónganme a cargo de las despensas del país, pues sabré protegerlas con conocimiento”.
arabic: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
